name: Doctor Luria

topics.response_text: I like to check up on things from time to time. I can't let this place fall apart, now can I?
I can give you stims or radiation supplies, which would you prefer?
I'm usually here a few days out of the week.  Mostly to keep the fridge stocked.  Plus it's nice to get away from it all every now and then.
Okay, I'll have them here for you if you want them.

description:
Doctor Luria is a 38 year-old Caucasian Female.

A dedicated physician working with the Followers of the Apocalypse, Doctor Luria manages the medical supplies at the Followers safehouse northwest of New Vegas. She maintains a well-stocked inventory of essential medical items including stimpaks, super stimpaks, Rad-X, and RadAway, ensuring they're available for any Follower in need. Despite her medical expertise, she cannot directly heal the player character.

Doctor Luria's Personality: Compassionate and methodical, Doctor Luria is committed to the Followers' mission of preserving knowledge and aiding those in need. She is professional in her demeanor, focused on her duties, and maintains a neutral outlook on the conflicts between factions in the Mojave. She speaks with a calm, measured tone and values efficiency in her work.

Doctor Luria's Backstory: Born and raised in the ruins of California, Doctor Luria was trained in medicine by the Followers of the Apocalypse at their Boneyard settlement. She dedicated her life to their cause, believing that knowledge and medical care are essential for rebuilding civilization. After years of service in the Followers' California chapters, she was transferred to the Mojave Wasteland in 2278 to assist with their operations there. For the past three years, she has been managing the medical supplies at the Followers' safehouse, ensuring their members have access to vital resources in the harsh desert environment.
